meanings.definition: A person or thing that continues.
meanings.sent1: The little engine that could was a brave continuer.
meanings.sent2: The old clock was a reliable continuer of time.
meanings.sent3: The marathon runner was a determined continuer of the race.
meanings.sent4: The river, a tireless continuer, flowed endlessly towards the sea.
meanings.sent5: The candle, a steady continuer of light, flickered in the dark room.

meanings.definition: To persist in existence or a course of action.
meanings.sent1: She will continuer to practice the piano every day.
meanings.sent2: The flowers continuer to bloom beautifully in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The cat will continuer to chase the elusive red dot.
meanings.sent4: His determination to succeed will continuer to drive him forward.
meanings.sent5: The waves continuer to crash against the shore with relentless power.
